\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w brothers|strong="H0251"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w trained|strong="H3925"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w expert|strong="H3925"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* melody \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w eighty-eight|strong="H8084"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* selection \w was|strong="H1486"\w* made \w of|strong="H4931"\w* \w them|strong="H5307"\w* \w for|strong="H0995"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* special work, \w all|strong="H1419"\w* having equal chances, \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w as|strong="H5980"\w* \w well|strong="H5980"\w* \w as|strong="H5980"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w teacher|strong="H0995"\w* \w as|strong="H5980"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* learner.
